tag.description: Renders a string value xml indented and colored, if possible. If enabled the value will be stored in file, which can be downloaded by the user by a link.

attribute.description: True, if a file containig the value eshould be stored and a link for download should be rendered. Default is false.
attribute.name: downloadable

attribute.description: The directory, where the created files should be stored. The directory must exist!
attribute.name: downloadDir

attribute.description: Time in minutes a created file should be stored. If <= 0 the file will never be stored automatically.
attribute.name: minutesUntilDelete

attribute.description: The value rendered in this attribute. If xml, the value will be rendered indented and colored.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) to be applied when this element is rendered. This value must be passed through as the "class" attribute on generated markup.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: A comma seperated list of the schema urls used to validate the XML value!
attribute.name: schemaURLS
